author: NASS
description:
I used a new restoration and colorization technique and created sound design for this rare footage from 1930s Warsaw, Poland captures everyday urban life before the war. The camera moves through busy streets with pedestrians, streetcars, cars, markets, and iconic architecture, including the Grand Theater and central plazas. People interact playfully with the camera—smiling, gesturing, and going about their routines. Market stalls, shop signs, public transportation, and lively intersections show a modern, energetic city. There are interior and exterior shots, rainy days, sunny squares, and scenes of people feeding birds. offers a vivid portrait of a thriving European capital, its culture, atmosphere, and social rhythms preserved in motion.

Video Restoration Process:
✔ FPS boosted to 60 frames per second 
✔ Image resolution boosted up to HD 
✔ Improved video sharpness and brightness 
✔ Colorized only for the ambiance (not historically accurate)
✔added sound only for the ambiance
✔resto
title: Warsaw 1930s in Color, Pre-War City Life [60fps, Remastered + Sound]
